name: Fungle
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Take control of a fungal alien who has crash landed on a Jungle island inhabited by the local Marsupial populace known as the Due. Survive, fight, and transform the Due into your fungal minions as you take over the island and escape on a rescue ship.

Welcome to Fungle.

PRE-MADE CONTENT:

3rd Person C++ Template - Epic Games

Foliage, Waterfall - Soul Cave, Epic Games

Skybox - Ultra Dynamics Sky, Everett Gunther

Fire Particle Effects - Elemental Demo, Epic Games

Crab Models - Satchel Quinn

Environmental Textures - Poliigon

Lemon/Milk Typeface - Marsnev

CONTROLS:

Movement - wasd
Dpace bar - jump

Spore Blaster Shot - Left Click
Mark target for attack  - right click
Mind spore - shift
mark target for nova -  Right click + left click
zoom camera - tab
